org.xlattice.node

Class OverlayConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.node.OverlayConfig

  • public class OverlayConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    The Overlay specification from the Node's XML configuration file. Currently this is limited to the names of the Overlay's data directory and the Overlay's class.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon
